text: After gathering feedback from ACR and other stakeholders, the @US_FDA has developed an FAQ clarifying its Emergency Use Authorization (EUA) on using #chloroquine and #hydroxychloroquine to treat #COVID-19 patients. https://t.co/FhAvSD5b1c #Covid4Rheums #DrugShortage #hcq https://t.co/3kJeb9WRq7
